root_causes: Selection filter is reversed: code sets flt=1 when S7_1 > 0 but then selects cases where flt is missing (sel if miss(flt)) which excludes the intended group.
Incorrect variable referenced in nvalid(): script uses nvalid(B5cDKx1) but expected specific item variable is B5cDKx1_99 (the single answer code 99).
instructions: Reverse the selection logic so respondents with S7_1 > 0 are included. For example: if S7_1 > 0 flt = 1. TEMPORARY. sel if flt = 1 and (B5cDKx1_99 = 99 or nvalid(B5cDKx1_99) > 0).

Use the exact variable for the single answer code (B5cDKx1_99) when checking for valid responses or the code 99 explicitly; replace nvalid(B5cDKx1) with either nvalid(B5cDKx1_99) > 0 or (B5cDKx1_99 = 99).
Keep the temporary flag cleanup (del var flt) but ensure the TEMPORARY selection wraps the sel/list as intended.

root_causes: Selection filter is reversed: script sets flt=1 when S7_2 > 0 but then selects where flt is missing, thereby excluding the intended respondents.
Incorrect variable referenced in nvalid(): uses nvalid(B5cDKx2) instead of the expected B5cDKx2_99.
instructions: Change selection to include respondents with S7_2 > 0. For example: if S7_2 > 0 flt = 1. TEMPORARY. sel if flt = 1 and (B5cDKx2_99 = 99 or nvalid(B5cDKx2_99) > 0).
Reference the specific answer variable B5cDKx2_99 when checking for responses (either check equality to 99 or use nvalid on that exact variable).
Ensure the temporary flag is deleted after use (del var flt) as currently done.

root_causes: Selection logic is inverted: flt is set when S7_3 > 0 but sel if miss(flt) excludes those cases instead of including them.
Wrong response variable used in validation: nvalid(B5cDKx3) is used but expected variable is B5cDKx3_99.
instructions: Include respondents with S7_3 > 0 in the selection. Example: if S7_3 > 0 flt = 1. TEMPORARY. sel if flt = 1 and (B5cDKx3_99 = 99 or nvalid(B5cDKx3_99) > 0).
Validate against the exact item variable B5cDKx3_99 rather than B5cDKx3; replace nvalid(B5cDKx3) with nvalid(B5cDKx3_99) or check B5cDKx3_99 = 99 explicitly.
Retain deletion of the temporary flag after listing (del var flt).

root_causes: Filter is inverted: flt is set when S7_4 > 0 but selection uses sel if miss(flt), excluding intended respondents.
Validation uses B5cDKx4 instead of the expected single-code variable B5cDKx4_99.
instructions: Modify selection to include cases where S7_4 > 0. For example: if S7_4 > 0 flt = 1. TEMPORARY. sel if flt = 1 and (B5cDKx4_99 = 99 or nvalid(B5cDKx4_99) > 0).
Reference the specific response variable B5cDKx4_99 when checking for answers; replace nvalid(B5cDKx4) with nvalid(B5cDKx4_99) or an explicit (B5cDKx4_99 = 99) check.
Keep cleaning up the temporary flag with del var flt after listing.
